医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肠道转运时间和 pH 值影响微生物组个体和饮食反应科学家揭示肠道转运时间和 pH 值是微生物组和代谢个体的关键驱动因素，为个性化饮食策略铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Gut-transit-time-and-pH-shape-microbiome-individuality-and-dietary-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Gut-transit-time-and-pH-shape-microbiome-individuality-and-dietary-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dee15020-db10-4e4d-8e05-2983d4d17f58 Sun, 01 Dec 2024 22:26:00 -0500 Gut transit time and pH shape microbiome individuality and dietary responses
牛肉适合心脏健康的饮食吗？回顾提供了新的见解系统评价表明，未加工的牛肉对心血管健康指标的影响极小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Can-beef-fit-in-a-heart-healthy-diet-Review-provides-new-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Can-beef-fit-in-a-heart-healthy-diet-Review-provides-new-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f24d763d-94ee-4afa-a227-e4047c796ccb Sun, 01 Dec 2024 22:00:00 -0500 Can beef fit in a heart-healthy diet? Review provides new insights
研究发现，定期睡眠对心脏健康有益不规律的睡眠模式会显着增加主要不良心血管事件 (MACE) 的风险，而较高的睡眠规律性与降低心血管风险相关。英国生物银行的这项大型研究强调了在公共卫生和临床指南中优先考虑睡眠规律的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Heart-health-benefits-soar-with-regular-sleep-schedules-research-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Heart-health-benefits-soar-with-regular-sleep-schedules-research-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=843d8269-da40-4753-be2e-6f0eda81e0ac Sun, 01 Dec 2024 21:25:00 -0500 Heart health benefits soar with regular sleep schedules, research finds
男性因肥胖和心脏病风险而面临更严重的大脑老化肥胖和心血管危险因素会加速脑容量损失，男性会更早受到更显着的影响，这凸显了早期干预预防神经退行性变的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Men-face-sharper-brain-aging-from-obesity-and-heart-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Men-face-sharper-brain-aging-from-obesity-and-heart-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=577fa058-6970-45d2-8eb6-09b66ba6009d Sun, 01 Dec 2024 20:58:00 -0500 Men face sharper brain aging from obesity and heart risks
胶囊海绵测试彻底改变了 GERD 诊断，减少了不必要的内窥镜检查胶囊海绵测试是一种微创诊断工具，可有效对胃食管反流病 (GERD) 患者进行分类，减少 70% 不必要的内窥镜检查，并在现实临床环境中准确识别巴雷特食管和癌症的高风险病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Capsule-sponge-test-revolutionizes-GERD-diagnosis-reduces-unnecessary-endoscopies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Capsule-sponge-test-revolutionizes-GERD-diagnosis-reduces-unnecessary-endoscopies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c91f3e9-fda2-4d8c-b497-a4d2bd8f3b04 Sun, 01 Dec 2024 20:33:00 -0500 Capsule sponge test revolutionizes GERD diagnosis, reduces unnecessary endoscopies
社交媒体上关于肥胖问题的讨论中，明星力量让科学黯然失色名人关于肥胖和减肥的推文比医学权威的推文吸引了更多的积极参与，这突显了他们作为强大的健康使者的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Star-power-eclipses-science-in-obesity-discussions-on-social-media.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Star-power-eclipses-science-in-obesity-discussions-on-social-media.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a40d949-ce84-4658-ae5c-7d04d617f609 Sun, 01 Dec 2024 20:05:00 -0500 Star power eclipses science in obesity discussions on social media
神经连接预测特发性震颤的深部脑刺激成功研究揭示了特定的皮质丘脑连接模式如何通过深部脑刺激（DBS）影响特发性震颤抑制。它强调对侧丘脑作为震颤调节的关键驱动因素和增强干预策略的潜在途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Neural-connectivity-predicts-deep-brain-stimulation-success-in-essential-tremor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Neural-connectivity-predicts-deep-brain-stimulation-success-in-essential-tremor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a89a2144-02f7-4787-822c-612c7f05d3ab Sun, 01 Dec 2024 19:38:00 -0500 Neural connectivity predicts deep brain stimulation success in essential tremor
成纤维细胞网状细胞为肺癌的免疫防御提供动力成纤维细胞网状细胞 (FRC) 在肺癌肿瘤内创建 T 细胞支持微生境，促进 T 细胞迁移、聚集和激活。这项研究强调了 FRC 作为增强非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 抗肿瘤免疫治疗靶点的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Fibroblastic-retular-cells-power-immune-defenses-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Fibroblastic-retular-cells-power-immune-defenses-in-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e449c66-79db-4abf-94bf-5596bd356900 Sun, 01 Dec 2024 19:25:00 -0500 Fibroblastic reticular cells power immune defenses in lung cancer
Quabodepistat 组合有望实现更安全、更快速的结核病治疗研究强调了 quabodepistat 与 delamanid、bedaquiline 或两者联合使用时的安全性和早期杀菌活性，为更短、更耐受的结核病治疗方案提供了潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Quabodepistat-combo-shows-promise-for-safer-faster-tuberculosis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Quabodepistat-combo-shows-promise-for-safer-faster-tuberculosis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea6a1201-fcc0-415b-b013-467279be752d Sun, 01 Dec 2024 19:17:00 -0500 Quabodepistat combo shows promise for safer, faster tuberculosis treatment
系统性障碍阻碍了学术医学领域的多元化人才《美国医学会杂志》网络开放研究揭示了学术医学领域持续存在的不平等，女性和少数族裔医生在晋升方面面临重大障碍。这些植根于系统性偏见的差异凸显了招聘和评估流程改革的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Systemic-barriers-hold-back-diverse-talent-in-academic-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241201/Systemic-barriers-hold-back-diverse-talent-in-academic-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee66b4e7-984c-4386-a24f-05c2d67c7f66 Sun, 01 Dec 2024 19:06:00 -0500 Systemic barriers hold back diverse talent in academic medicine
